locations.name: Melbourne
locations.description: Australia's 'capital of cool', known for its vibrant laneways, street art, coffee culture, and dining scene.

locations.name: Hamilton Island
locations.description: A popular island in the Whitsundays, serving as a base for exploring the Great Barrier Reef and iconic Whitehaven Beach.

locations.name: Sydney
locations.description: Australia's largest city, famous for the Sydney Opera House, Harbour Bridge, Bondi Beach, and vibrant neighbourhoods.

locations.name: Bouddi Peninsula
locations.description: A coastal region near Sydney known for Bouddi National Park, offering cliff-top walks, secluded beaches, and natural tranquility.
